author: Special Correspondent
text:
Work on widening and beautifying the Ariyalur railway station in full swing. A new platform is being constructed as part of the plan.— PHOTO: M. SRINATH

The Ariyalur railway station is being beautified and expanded, and the work is being executed at a fast pace.

While the project on doubling the track between Ariyalur and Valadi segment to a length of 50 km had been executed, the 25-km stretch between Ariyalur and Mathur would be commissioned in course of time. As part of doubling of the track, the Ariyalur station has been beautified and expanded, according to Rail Vikas Nigam Limited (RVNL).

Sources said that length of the additional platform would be 550 metres. Once work on the platform was completed, work on basic amenities such as roof, water supply, and passenger benches would be provided. The additional platform, the source said, would ensure smooth operation of trains.
title: Ariyalur work on fast track
